scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build-electron && ENVIRONMENT=staging electron . --dev
scripts.dev-win: npm run clean-win && npm run build-electron-win && ENVIRONMENT=staging electron . --dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-renderer && npm run build-electron
scripts.build-win: npm run clean-win && npm run build-renderer && npm run build-electron-win
scripts.dist-win-staging: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.staging.json --win --x64 --publish never
scripts.dist-win-staging-upload: npm run dist-win-staging && npm run upload-staging-win-unsigned
scripts.dist-win-production: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.production.json --win --x64 --arm64 --publish never
scripts.dist-win-production-upload: npm run dist-win-production && npm run upload-production-win-unsigned
scripts.upload-staging-win-unsigned: npm run clear-staging-win-unsigned && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://6529bucket/6529-staging-core-app/win-unsigned/ --exclude '*' --include '*.exe' --include '*.blockmap' --include 'latest.yml' --exclude '*/**'
scripts.upload-production-win-unsigned: npm run clear-production-win-unsigned && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://6529bucket/6529-core-app/win-unsigned/ --exclude '*' --include '*.exe' --include '*.blockmap' --include 'latest.yml' --exclude '*/**'
scripts.sign-publish-staging-win: npm run clean-win && npm run download-staging-win-unsigned && npm run sign-win && npm run upload-staging-win-signed
scripts.sign-publish-production-win: npm run clean-win && npm run download-production-win-unsigned && npm run sign-win && npm run upload-production-win-signed
scripts.dist-mac-local: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.local.json --mac --arm64 --publish never
scripts.dist-mac-staging: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.staging.json --mac --arm64 --publish always
scripts.dist-mac-production: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.production.json --mac --arm64 --x64 --publish always
scripts.dist-mac-production-x64: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.production-x64.json --mac --publish always
scripts.dist-mac-production-arm64: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.production.json --mac --publish always
scripts.dist-linux-staging: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.staging.json --linux --x64 --publish always
scripts.dist-linux-production: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.production.json --linux --x64 --publish always
